subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets led by three runs as late as the seventh inning but gave it all back and eventually lost when Chase Utley hit a home run in the 11th inning off Bobby Parnell.
snippet: The Mets led by three runs as late as the seventh inning but gave it all back and eventually lost when Chase Utley hit a home run in the 11th inning off Bobby Parnell.
